DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy three approach diabetes management : ( 1 ) community health worker ( CHW ) education ; ( 2 ) text messaging ; ( 3 ) usual hospital-based care . The goal determine cost-effective method diabetes management among economically-disadvantaged , minority population .
DOC.detailed_description: The CHAMP study test efficacy two intervention design decrease uncontrolled hyperglycemia ( define Hemoglobin-A1C ( A1C ) 9 % ) among adults diabetes . Patients safety-net hospital randomize three group : 1 ) control group , 2 ) intervention provide diabetes self-care text message , 3 ) intervention use community health worker provide diabetes education linkage care . Secondary objective include increase diabetes knowledge , improve diabetes self-management , increase use primary care ( i.e. , make one visit physician 6 month ) among intervention participant . A cost-effectiveness analysis determine appropriate way reduce burden uncontrolled diabetes .
